summary: Garrus Vakarian follower for Skyrim. This is not my mod. If anyone knows who created it, please tell me so I can credit them. I am uploading this here temporarily for my convenience.
descriptionHtml:
THIS MOD IS A TEMPORARY UPLOAD. I WILL EVENTUALLY BE TAKING THIS DOWN

Garrus Vakarian follower for Skyrim. [b]This is not my mod.[/b]Â I did not create this. If anyone knows who created it, please tell me so I can credit them. I am uploading this here[b][i] temporarily [/i][/b]for my convenience.

This mod should allow for a Garrus Vakarian follower (from the Mass Effect Series.) He has dialogue ported from Mass Effect, and he can be found in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.

Again, this is not my mod! Download it at your own risk! I'm currently working on adapting it for SSE, and maybe (this is a huge maybe) making him a marriageable character. If you have any information about the mod's original creator,[b] please[/b] tell me. [b][u]If you are the original creator and you want me to take this down, I will.[/u][/b]
author: Unknown
